Posts.Content: Can anyone give me advice. I am 64 yrs old. I had a mastectomy on right breast. Reconstruction failed. I am a D cup. Left breast is so droopy. I can't get them even with the PROSESIS. Is there something I can get that will lift my droopy breast. I can't wear sports bras, bathing suits, etc., my life is such a hassle trying to get even boobs!!! Any suggestions will be greatly appreciated!!! :)
Posts.Title: Uneven breast

Posts.Content: Thanks so much for input. I need to check and see if my insurance will cover a lift. Not sure if it will be considered medically necessary without reconstruction.
Posts.Title: Uneven breast
